title: VFL: skills
brief_description: Step-by-step Australian Rules instructions, skills and techniques demonstrated by senior VFL players. A vital tool in mastering all aspects of this modern, national game for all kids. Includes interviews with Dennis Carroll, Tim Watson and Todd Viney. No other credits available.
